resources.string: Choose a method to assign legths to the three sides of the triangle
Select a side. Then, move the phone to set its length.
Write the lengths of the three sides. After pressing the button, your phone will recover the triangle type from a web server
Write the lengths of the three sides and press the button. The triangle type will be determined locally:
Select a side. Then, draw the length with your finger. When you have finished, press the button to determine the triangle type.
Get type by asking a web server

This app implements the Bertrand Myers\' triangle-type determination problem. Its goal is only to provide a benchmark implementation for comparing testing techniques in Android apps. Developed by the Alarcos Research Group: http://alarcos.esi.uclm.es
